body: A look back to 2010 with Neojaponisme's Matthew Penney who "presents [en] some highlights of 2010 that speak to different directions in contemporary manga" [en]. Among those also Saint Young Men and Thermae Romae.
original_body: A look back to 2010 with Neojaponisme's Matthew Penney who "presents [en] some highlights of 2010 that speak to different directions in contemporary manga" [en]. Among those also Saint Young Men and Thermae Romae.
title: Japan: 2010 in Manga

sentence: A look back to 2010 with Neojaponisme's Matthew Penney who "presents [en] some highlights of 2010 that speak to different directions in contemporary manga" [en].
Among those also Saint Young Men and Thermae Romae.
